name: Weekly Double Bottom/Top Reversal Strategy
description: Intermediate-complexity, conservative price-action strategy trading weekly bars across liquid U.S. equities and the E-mini S&P 500 futures. It seeks trend reversals by detecting confirmed Double Bottom (long) and Double Top (short) patterns validated by volume spikes ≥150 % of the 20-week average. Entries occur on weekly closes through the pattern neckline; exits use a 10 % trailing stop or a 2R fixed take-profit. Portfolio risk is capped at 2 % equity per trade with a maximum of two concurrent positions.
